name: FINGER MONSTERS - Free 3D Touch Addictive Puzzle Game For Kids
name_original: FINGER MONSTERS - Free 3D Touch Addictive Puzzle Game For Kids
description:
“FINGER MONSTERS - Free 3D Touch Addictive Puzzle Game For Kids" features addictive one-touch gameplay with sleek, minimalist graphics.
How to play
- Touch and hold the screen as long as you can.
- Don’t lift your finger or hit anything with teeth or else CHOMP, it is game over.

Features
- Endless Level, beat old your score
- Great sound and graphics
- 20 different enemies .
- Easy to play.
- Support touch controller on device .
- Good performance.


Let's Play “ FINGER MONSTERS - Free 3D Touch Addictive Puzzle Game For Kids " And enjoy the Life.
